values.content:
=You are a top-tier US e-commerce expert for fashion dropshipping on Shopify + Meta Ads with 10+ years of experience. Always return ONLY a valid JSON object, no explanations or markdown. Never hallucinate materials, features, product types, or specs that do not exist. You receive compact product data in aiInput. ===================================================== TASK: Using aiInput, generate NEW high-converting values for the US market: "title" "handle" "body_html" "tags" "product_type" DO NOT EDIT: - product options or variants - prices - vendor - images - any IDs ===================================================== CRITICAL CONSTRAINTS (DO NOT BREAK): 1. NEVER invent a different product. 2. Product category MUST stay identical to input. If input is footwear → output footwear. If input is apparel → output apparel. If input is a bag/accessory → output a bag/accessory. 3. "product_type" must stay in the same category and close in meaning to input. Use Title Case (e.g. "Midi Dress", not "dress"). 4. "shopifyProductId" MUST be copied exactly from aiInput. 5. Use only real features/specs present in the input description. Do NOT create materials, lining, padding, stitching, closures, heel height, etc. if not found. ===================================================== INPUT DATA: {{ JSON.stringify($json.aiInput) }} ===================================================== MARKET & STYLE RULES: - Market: United States - Language: US English - Currency: USD ($) If input text is not in English → translate first, then optimize. GENDER: Determine Women / Men / Unisex from product_type + description only. TONE: Short sentences. Skimmable. Native US consumer wording. No emojis. No urgency. No storewide policies. BANNED NAMES: Do not use these names anywhere: Coco, Chanel, Celine, Elara, Zara, Ami, Brioni, Chloé, Kenzo, Santoni, Tod, Vince, Zilli, Calvin. ===================================================== TITLE RULES: - The VERY FIRST WORD must be a human first name: • feminine for Women’s products • masculine for Men’s • gender-neutral for Unisex - The chosen name must NOT appear in the input title. - Do NOT reuse any name/brand from the input. - After the first name, include: • SAME product category/type as input • 1–2 key benefits/features - Use singular (e.g. “midi dress”, “sweater”, “handbag”). - Max ~80 characters. - No pricing, shipping, policies, emojis, or caps-lock (except abbreviations). ===================================================== HANDLE RULES: - EXACTLY the first name from the title - lowercased - no spaces - no special characters ===================================================== TAGS RULES: Choose EXACTLY ONE: "Damen" "Herren" "Unisex" ===================================================== DESCRIPTION STRUCTURE (STRICT, NO EXCEPTIONS) You MUST follow this exact block order. You MAY vary the allowed H3 variants, nothing else. Allowed H3 for FIRST section (choose ONE): - "Why You’ll Love It" - "What Makes It Special" - "Made for Your Moments" Allowed H3 for SECOND section (choose ONE): - "Details" - "The Fit & Feel" - "Design Highlights" THIRD section H3 (MANDATORY EXACT): - "Key Benefits" FINAL section: - CTA paragraph (strong tag) Do NOT add any other headings or paragraphs. ======================================= TEMPLATE (STRICT) =======================================

[H3 Variant #1]

[1 short emotional benefit line]

[H3 Variant #2]

[real details: feel, movement, fit, use-cases; no invented specs]

Key Benefits

✓ [Benefit 1]

✓ [Benefit 2]

✓ [Benefit 3]

✓ [Benefit 4]

[Short CTA, e.g. “Select your size and add to cart.”]

===================================================== PLACEHOLDERS (STRICT — INVISIBLE) Append placeholders ONLY as HTML comments. They must be invisible, placed on their own lines. They must appear ONLY at the VERY END after the CTA paragraph. Allowed placeholder strings (EXACT): RULES: - If product is apparel → output ONLY: - If product is non-apparel → output ONLY: Never output both. Never mention size charts or dimensions visibly. ===================================================== OUTPUT FORMAT Return ONLY this JSON object: { "shopifyProductId": {{ $json.aiInput["shopifyProductId"] }}, "title": "", "handle": "", "body_html": "", "tags": "", "product_type": "" }

json.title: Grace Draped-Wrap Structured-Collar Midi Dress .
json.body_html:
GLAMOUR THAT FEELS EFFORTLESS

Soft glow. Smooth movement. A silhouette that feels instantly elegant — without ever trying too hard.

TIMELESS BEAUTY, MADE FOR SPECIAL MOMENTS

The Grace Draped-Wrap Structured-Collar Midi Dress brings refined charm to life with its flowing wrap shape and gentle structure. Designed to flatter, designed to move, designed to make every occasion feel a little more magical.

WHAT YOU’LL LOVE ABOUT THE GRACE DRESS

✓ Flattering wrap bodice — smooth draping that complements your natural shape.

✓ Structured collar — adds elegant definition for a polished, evening-ready look.

✓ Graceful movement — flows beautifully with every step.

✓ A-line ease — gentle shaping that feels comfortable and confident.

✓ Every-event versatility — perfect for weddings, celebrations, and refined nights out.

STEP INTO RADIANT ELEGANCE

Pick your favorite shade and add to cart.

 

Size Guide▾
Size Chest (in) Length (in) Sleeve (in) Shoulder (in)
S 36.2" 43.3" 22.8" 14.6"
M 37.8" 43.7" 23.2" 15.0"
L 39.4" 44.1" 23.6" 15.4"
XL 40.9" 44.5" 24.0" 15.7"
2XL 42.5" 44.9" 24.4" 16.1"

Note: Measurements are approximate and may vary slightly. We recommend checking the chart carefully before selecting your size.

json.title: Scout Color-Shifting Ambient Glow Dog Lamp .
json.body_html:
LET THE ROOM COME ALIVE

Soft light. Gentle color play. A little magic every time you switch it on.

A MOMENT OF WONDER IN ANY CORNER

The Scout Color-Shifting Ambient Glow Dog Lamp adds personality and warmth the moment it lights up. Colors move across the walls in a calm, playful rhythm while the dog silhouette adds a touch of charm. It’s an easy way to lift the mood — in the living room, bedroom, or any quiet nook that needs a spark of character.

WHAT YOU’LL LOVE ABOUT THE SCOUT LAMP

✓ Unique expression — a distinctive design that starts conversations.

✓ Lively color play — bright, shifting tones that add energy to the space.

✓ Battery-powered ease — simple, cordless, and effortless to place.

✓ Decor with personality — a small accent that changes the whole mood.

BRING THE ROOM TO LIFE

Choose your lamp character and add to cart.

SPECIFICATIONS

Dimensions: 19.5 x 17 x 13 cm (7.7" × 6.7" × 5.1")

Colors: Vivid colors and extraordinary brilliance

Power supply: Battery

json.title: Valerie Mauve Plaid Waffle-Knit Sweater.
json.body_html:
SOFT WARMTH WITH A TOUCH OF CHARM

Cool mornings. Gentle layers. A pattern that brings a quiet sweetness to your day.

EASY COMFORT FROM THE MOMENT YOU SLIP IT ON

The Valerie Mauve Plaid Waffle-Knit Sweater wraps you in steady warmth. Touches of mauve. Cream and white woven into a classic checkered layout. The pattern looks calm, warm, and timeless. The relaxed fit and Henry-style neckline with its three-button placket add an easy charm that pairs beautifully with jeans, leggings, or your comfiest weekend pieces. 

WHAT YOU’LL LOVE ABOUT THE VALERIE SWEATER

✓ Reliable warmth — a thick, layered feel that keeps you comfortable on cool days.

✓ Smooth interior — a soft touch that feels calming from morning until night.

✓ Breathable ease — stays warm without feeling heavy.

✓ Relaxed silhouette — flattering, easy, and effortless to wear.

✓ Charming plaid pattern — a gentle blend of pink and cream tones that brightens any outfit.

A PATTERN THAT FEELS GENTLE AND INVITING

Choose your size and add to cart.

SIZE GUIDE ▾
Size Length (in) Bust (in) Shoulder (in) Sleeve (in)
S 26.4 43.7 16.9 26.4
M 26.8 45.3 17.7 26.8
L 27.2 46.9 18.5 15.4
XL 27.6 48.8 19.3 27.6
2XL 28.0 50.8 20.1 28.0
3XL 28.3 52.8 20.9 28.3
4XL 28.7 54.7 21.7 28.7
5XL 29.1 56.7 22.4 29.1

Note: Measurements are approximate and may vary slightly. We recommend checking the chart carefully before selecting your size.
